text: On privel vam pritchu o vas samikh. Yest' li sredi nevol'nikov, kotorymi ovladeli vashi desnitsy, sovladel'tsy togo, chem My nadelili vas, kotoryye imeyut s vami odinakovyye prava na eto i kotorykh vy opasayetes' tak, kak opasayetes' drug druga? Tak My raz"yasnyayem znameniya dlya lyudey razumeyushchikh
